TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelimitedListTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 將追蹤或偵錯輸出導向文字寫入器，例如資料流寫入器，或導向資料流，例如檔案資料流。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output to a text writer, such as a stream writer, or to a stream, such as a file stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此追蹤輸出使用分隔的文字格式，該格式使用由 屬性指定的分隔符號。The trace output is in a delimited text format that uses the delimiter specified by the property. 分隔符號用來終止在某一行輸出中的每個欄位。The delimiter is used to terminate each field in a line of output. 例如，若要顯示追蹤的輸出中的 Microsoft Excel 試算表，您可以指定逗號 （"，"） 做為分隔符號，並建立以逗號分隔值 (CSV) 檔案。For example, to display the trace output in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet, you might specify a comma (",") as a delimiter and create a comma-separated value (CSV) file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 介面。 interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try`/ `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a`try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 您可以啟用或停用應用程式組態檔，然後使用已設定透過應用程式中。You can enable or disable a through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，您可以在其中建立程式碼中。Alternately, you can create a in your code. > [!NOTE] > 分隔，就會發出使用方法名稱開頭為文字的文字`Trace`，例如或。The delimits only text that is emitted by using the methods that have names starting with the word `Trace`, such as or . 追蹤資料的使用，就會發出和方法不以符號分隔。Trace data that is emitted by using the and methods is not delimited. 若要設定，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To configure a , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以加入接聽程式、 設定接聽程式的屬性或方法移除接聽程式。In this file, you can add a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove a listener. 組態檔應該格式化，如下列範例所示：The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果您嘗試寫入檔案正在使用或無法使用，檔案名稱自動的前置詞的 GUID。If you try to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 接聽程式要使用的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資訊。Listeners are intended to be used by methods of the , , and classes to write trace information. 接聽程式的方法，除了建構函式，不應該直接從應用程式程式碼呼叫。Listener methods, except for constructors, should not be called directly from application code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的值`name`參數，或為空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 屬性可用來當做索引`Listeners`要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定執行個體的屬性具有名稱"delimListener 」:For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ```csharp ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體所指定的檔案，為指定的路徑上的類別使用編碼方式。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果檔案存在，它會附加至。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要減少例外狀況的機會，可能會使輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 屬性設定的值為`name`參數，或為空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。The property is set to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 屬性可用來當做索引`Listeners`要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定執行個體的屬性具有名稱"delimListener 」:For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ```csharp ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

summary.span: 取得或設定已分隔清單的分隔符。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter for the delimited list.
The delimiter for the delimited list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設分隔符號是 「; 」（分號）。The default delimiter is ";" (semicolon). 下列組態檔範例顯示的設定屬性使用`delimiter`組態檔中的屬性：The following configuration file example shows the setting of the property using the `delimiter` attribute in a configuration file: ```xml ```

returns.span: 字串陣列，其中包含字串值 "delimiter"。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂屬性會是不繼承自基底類別，可用來設定類別的屬性的屬性。A custom attribute is an attribute that is not inherited from the base class that can be used to set a property for the class. 自訂屬性用來設定屬性。The custom attribute for is used to set the property. 下列組態檔範例示範使用`delimiter`屬性，設定屬性：The following configuration file example shows the use of the `delimiter` attribute to set the property: ```xml ```

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 物件，包含目前處理程序識別碼、執行緒識別碼與堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.name: source
param.span: 用來識別輸出的名稱，通常是產生追蹤事件的應用程式名稱。

span.span: A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個 值，可指定引發追蹤的事件類型。

span.span: One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 將資料物件寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: A data object to write to the output file or stream.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件，及事件資訊至輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`參數會寫入做為標頭。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 資料物件會轉換成字串，使用`ToString`物件的方法。The data object is converted to a string using the `ToString` method of the object. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為其內容而定的值的頁尾屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`參數會寫入做為標頭。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 資料物件會轉換成字串時，使用`ToString`每個物件的方法。The data objects are converted to strings using the `ToString` method of each object. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為其內容而定的值的頁尾屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，並`id`參數會寫入做為標頭，後面接著`message`資料。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header, followed by the `message` data. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為其內容而定的值的頁尾屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、格式化的物件陣列，及事件資訊至輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`參數會寫入做為標頭。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. `args`物件陣列轉換成字串，使用方法，傳遞`format`字串和`args`追蹤的訊息部分的格式字串的陣列。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message portion of the trace. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為其內容而定的值的頁尾屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.
